scenes.action_text: CHAOS Written by Tony Giglio Shooting script March 15th, 2004 FADE IN: BEGIN OPENING CREDITS: A1 EXT. PEARL STREET BRIDGE- NIGHT A1 CLOSE ON... A BRONZE PLAQUE which reads, "PEARL STREET BRIDGE." ON THE BRIDGE... RAIN POURS DOWN. An SUV steers out of control and CRASHES into a STALLED OUT VEHICLE. It's quiet NOW, EXCEPT FOR THE INCESSANT pounding rain. IN THE DISTANCE,
